amendment.description: An amendment numbered 189 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds available by division A of this Act may not be used to research, develop, test, evaluate, or procure any the following: 1) Expeditionary Fighting Vechile; 2) V-22 Osprey aircraft.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 91 - 339 (Roll no. 80).
